verses.verse: גַּם־ <WH1571> also אֵ֭לֶּה <WH428> These מִשְׁלֵ֣י <WH4912> These [are] also proverbs שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> of Solomon אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הֶ֝עְתִּ֗יקוּ <WH6275> copied out אַנְשֵׁ֤י ׀ <WH376> the men חִזְקִיָּ֬ה <WH2396> of Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

כְּבֹ֣ד <WH3519> [It is] the glory אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> of God הַסְתֵּ֣ר <WH5641> to conceal דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> a thing וּכְבֹ֥ד <WH3519> but the honour מְ֝לָכִ֗ים <WH4428> of kings חֲקֹ֣ר <WH2713> [is] to search out דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> a matter

שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> The heaven לָ֭רוּם <WH7312> for height וָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> and the earth לָעֹ֑מֶק <WH6011> for depth וְלֵ֥ב <WH3820> and the heart מְ֝לָכִ֗ים <WH4428> of kings אֵ֣ין <WH369> else חֵֽקֶר׃ <WH2714> [is] unsearchable
הָג֣וֹ <WH1898> Take away סִיגִ֣ים <WH5509> the dross מִכָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> from the silver וַיֵּצֵ֖א <WH3318> and there shall come forth לַצֹּרֵ֣ף <WH6884> for the finer כֶּֽלִי׃ <WH3627> a vessel

הָג֣וֹ <WH1898> Take away רָ֭שָׁע <WH7563> the wicked לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> [from] before מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וְיִכּ֖וֹן <WH3559> shall be established בַּצֶּ֣דֶק <WH6664> in righteousness כִּסְאֽוֹ׃ <WH3678> and his throne

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּתְהַדַּ֥ר <WH1921> Put not forth לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> thyself in the presence מֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king וּבִמְק֥וֹם <WH4725> not in the place גְּ֝דֹלִ֗ים <WH1419> of great אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעֲמֹֽד׃ <WH5975> and stand

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for ט֥וֹב <WH2896> For better אֲמָר־ <WH559> [it is] that it be said לְךָ֗ עֲ‍ֽלֵ֫ה <WH5927> unto thee Come up הֵ֥נָּה <WH2008> here מֵֽ֭הַשְׁפִּ֣ילְךָ <WH8213> hither than that thou shouldest be put lower לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> in the presence נָדִ֑יב <WH5081> of the prince אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> Whom רָא֣וּ <WH7200> have seen עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> whom thine eyes

אַל־ <WH408> not תֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> Go not forth לָרִ֗ב <WH7378> to strive מַ֫הֵ֥ר <WH4118> hastily פֶּ֣ן <WH6435> Otherwise מַה־ <WH4100> what תַּ֭עֲשֶׂה <WH6213> lest [thou know not] what to do בְּאַחֲרִיתָ֑הּ <WH319> in the end בְּהַכְלִ֖ים <WH3637> hath put thee to shame אֹתְךָ֣ <WH853> רֵעֶֽךָ׃ <WH7453> thereof when thy neighbour

רִֽ֭יבְךָ <WH7378> Debate רִ֣יב <WH7379> thy cause אֶת־ <WH854> with רֵעֶ֑ךָ <WH7453> with thy neighbour וְס֖וֹד <WH5475> not a secret אַחֵ֣ר <WH312> to another אַל־ <WH408> not תְּגָֽל׃ <WH1540> [himself] and discover

פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> Or יְחַסֶּדְךָ֥ <WH2616> [it] put thee to shame שֹׁמֵ֑עַ <WH8085> Lest he that heareth וְ֝דִבָּתְךָ֗ <WH1681> and thine infamy לֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תָשֽׁוּב׃ <WH7725> turn not away

תַּפּוּחֵ֣י <WH8598> [is like] apples זָ֭הָב <WH2091> of gold בְּמַשְׂכִּיּ֥וֹת <WH4906> in pictures כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> of silver דָּ֝בָ֗ר <WH1697> A word דָּבֻ֥ר <WH1696> spoken עַל־ <WH5921> right אָפְנָֽיו׃ <WH655> circumstances

נֶ֣זֶם <WH5141> [As] an earring זָ֭הָב <WH2091> of gold וַחֲלִי־ <WH2481> and an ornament כָ֑תֶם <WH3800> of fine gold מוֹכִ֥יחַ <WH3198> reprover חָ֝כָ֗ם <WH2450> [so is] a wise עַל־ <WH5921> and אֹ֥זֶן <WH241> ear שֹׁמָֽעַת׃ <WH8085> upon an obedient

כְּצִנַּת־ <WH6793> As the cold שֶׁ֨לֶג ׀ <WH7950> of snow בְּי֬וֹם <WH3117> in the time קָצִ֗יר <WH7105> of harvest צִ֣יר <WH6735> messenger נֶ֭אֱמָן <WH539> [so is] a faithful לְשֹׁלְחָ֑יו <WH7971> to them that send וְנֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> the soul אֲדֹנָ֣יו <WH113> of his masters יָשִֽׁיב׃ <WH7725> him for he refresheth פ

נְשִׂיאִ֣ים <WH5387> [is like] clouds וְ֭רוּחַ <WH7307> and wind וְגֶ֣שֶׁם <WH1653> without rain אָ֑יִן <WH369> without אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> Whoso מִ֝תְהַלֵּ֗ל <WH1984> boasteth בְּמַתַּת־ <WH4991> gift שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> himself of a false

בְּאֹ֣רֶךְ <WH753> By long אַ֭פַּיִם <WH639> forbearing יְפֻתֶּ֣ה <WH6601> persuaded קָצִ֑ין <WH7101> is a prince וְלָשׁ֥וֹן <WH3956> tongue רַ֝כָּ֗ה <WH7390> and a soft תִּשְׁבָּר־ <WH7665> breaketh גָּֽרֶם׃ <WH1634> the bone

דְּבַ֣שׁ <WH1706> honey מָ֭צָאתָ <WH4672> Hast thou found אֱכֹ֣ל <WH398> burn up דַּיֶּ֑ךָּ <WH1767> so much as is sufficient פֶּן־ <WH6435> you not תִּ֝שְׂבָּעֶ֗נּוּ <WH7646> for thee lest thou be filled וַהֲקֵֽאתֽוֹ׃ <WH6958> therewith and vomit

הֹקַ֣ר <WH3365> Withdraw רַ֭גְלְךָ <WH7272> thy foot מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house רֵעֶ֑ךָ <WH7453> from thy neighbour's פֶּן־ <WH6435> Or יִ֝שְׂבָּעֲךָ֗ <WH7646> lest he be weary וּשְׂנֵאֶֽךָ׃ <WH8130> of thee and [so] hate

מֵפִ֣יץ <WH4650> [is] a maul וְ֭חֶרֶב <WH2719> and a sword וְחֵ֣ץ <WH2671> arrow שָׁנ֑וּן <WH8150> and a sharp אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> A man עֹנֶ֥ה <WH6030> that beareth בְ֝רֵעֵ֗הוּ <WH7453> against his neighbour עֵ֣ד <WH5707> witness שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> false.

שֵׁ֣ן <WH8127> tooth רֹ֭עָה <WH7465> [is like] a broken וְרֶ֣גֶל <WH7272> and a foot מוּעָ֑דֶת <WH4154> out of joint מִבְטָ֥ח <WH4009> Confidence בּ֝וֹגֵ֗ד <WH898> in an unfaithful man בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in time צָרָֽה׃ <WH6869> of trouble

מַ֥עֲדֶה <WH5710> [As] he that taketh away בֶּ֨גֶד ׀ <WH899> a garment בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> weather קָ֭רָה <WH7135> in cold חֹ֣מֶץ <WH2558> [and as] vinegar עַל־ <WH5921> on נָ֑תֶר <WH5427> upon nitre וְשָׁ֥ר <WH7891> so [is] he that singeth בַּ֝שִּׁרִ֗ים <WH7892> songs עַ֣ל <WH5921> and לֶב־ <WH3820> heart רָֽע׃ <WH7451> to an heavy פ

אִם־ <WH518> If רָעֵ֣ב <WH7456> famish שֹׂ֭נַאֲךָ <WH8130> If thine enemy הַאֲכִלֵ֣הוּ <WH398> to eat לָ֑חֶם <WH3899> give him bread וְאִם־ <WH518> and if צָ֝מֵ֗א <WH6771> and if he be thirsty הַשְׁקֵ֥הוּ <WH8248> to drink מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> give him water

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for גֶֽחָלִ֗ים <WH1513> coals of fire אַ֭תָּה <WH859> you חֹתֶ֣ה <WH2846> For thou shalt heap עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> upon his head וַֽ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God יְשַׁלֶּם־ <WH7999> shall reward לָֽךְ׃

ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> wind צָ֭פוֹן <WH6828> The north תְּח֣וֹלֵֽל <WH2342> driveth away גָּ֑שֶׁם <WH1653> rain וּפָנִ֥ים <WH6440> countenance נִ֝זְעָמִ֗ים <WH2194> so [doth] an angry לְשׁ֣וֹן <WH3956> tongue סָֽתֶר׃ <WH5643> a backbiting

ט֗וֹב <WH2896> [It is] better שֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> to dwell עַל־ <WH5921> in פִּנַּת־ <WH6438> in the corner גָּ֑ג <WH1406> of the housetop מֵאֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> woman [מִדֹונִים כ] (מִ֝דְיָנִ֗ים <WH4066> brawling ק) וּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> house חָֽבֶר׃ <WH2267> and in a wide

מַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters קָ֭רִים <WH7119> [As] cold עַל־ <WH5921> and נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> soul עֲיֵפָ֑ה <WH5889> to a thirsty וּשְׁמוּעָ֥ה <WH8052> news ט֝וֹבָ֗ה <WH2896> so [is] good מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> country מֶרְחָֽק׃ <WH4801> from a far

מַעְיָ֣ן <WH4599> fountain נִ֭רְפָּשׂ <WH7515> [is as] a troubled וּמָק֣וֹר <WH4726> spring מָשְׁחָ֑ת <WH7843> and a corrupt צַ֝דִּ֗יק <WH6662> A righteous מָ֣ט <WH4131> man falling down לִפְנֵֽי־ <WH6440> before רָשָֽׁע׃ <WH7563> the wicked

אָ֘כֹ֤ל <WH398> to eat דְּבַ֣שׁ <WH1706> honey הַרְבּ֣וֹת <WH7235> much לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor ט֑וֹב <WH2896> [It is] not good וְחֵ֖קֶר <WH2714> so [for men] to search כְּבֹדָ֣ם <WH3519> their own glory כָּבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> [is not] glory

עִ֣יר <WH5892> [is like] a city פְּ֭רוּצָה <WH6555> [that is] broken down אֵ֣ין <WH369> into without חוֹמָ֑ה <WH2346> [and] without walls אִ֝֗ישׁ <WH376> He אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who אֵ֖ין <WH369> has מַעְצָ֣ר <WH4623> that [hath] no rule לְרוּחֽוֹ׃ <WH7307> over his own spirit
